topics.body:
I've always been somewhat interested by the popularity of tokusatsu and "henshin heroes" in Japan. With how rigidly their society is structured, I would think they'd have more heroes who're superior through natural, inborn talents.

...but on second thought, maybe _that's_ the reason. That notion that this great power could fall into the hands of _anyone_, regardless of their status.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3
